parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The unique token which the server uses to recognize retries of the same request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: targetLifecycleStatus
parameters.description: The life cycle status to update in the session.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID to update in the session.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The queue ID to update in the session.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID to update in the session.
